Charlene Chiedza 'Chi' Kudzai Mhende (a mụrụ na 19 Ọktoba 1991), bụ onye Zimbabwe na-eme ihe nkiri, onye nduzi na onye na-ese okwu. A maara ya nke ọma maka ịkpasu ndị na-ege ntị akpata oyi n'ahụ site na ngosipụta nwoke ya nke 'Wandile Radebe' na South African soap opera Generations.
A mụrụ Mhende n'abalị 19 ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 1991 na Harare, Zimbabwe.

N'afọ 2015, ọ sonyeere ndị na-eme ihe nkiri ncha na South Africa Generations ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ 'Wandile Radebe', ọrụ nwoke. Ihe ngosi ahụ ghọrọ ihe na-ewu ewu ma gaa n'ihu ruo oge 4 gụnyere 1000 ihe omume.
N'afọ 2006, Mhende kwagara Cape Town iji mụọ na The School for the Creative Economy
Ọ malitere ime ihe nkiri na ọrụ 'Lady Capulet' na mmepụta Artscape Romeo na Juliet
Site na arụmọrụ magburu onwe ya na ya, a họọrọ ya maka ọtụtụ ihe nkiri dịka K
Sello Duiker's The Quiet Violence of Dreams, JM Coetzee's Waiting for the Barbarians, A Midsummer Night's Dream, Taming of the Shrew, The Comedy of Errors, na Richard III
Ọ pụtara na Generations:The Legacy ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ nwoke. N'afọ 2008, o ritere ihe nrite maka onye na-eme ihe nkiri kacha mma na AFDA awards.
O mechara soro òtù ndị dịka 'Bonfire Improv Theatre Company' na 'Zakheni Arts Therapy Foundation' rụọ ọrụ ma nye aka na ihe nkiri na South Africa
A makwaara ya dịka olu nke 'Siyaya' na usoro ahụike zuru ụwa ọnụ nke Al Jazeera 'Lifelines'
N'afọ 2014, Mhende mere ihe nkiri mbụ ya na ihe nkiri Love the One You Love

Ihe nkiri ahụ nwere ihe ngosi mbụ ya n'afọ 2014 Durban International Film Festival ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ 'Sandile' ebe ọ ghọrọ onye na-eme ihe nkiri kacha mma. N'afọ 2015, a họpụtara ya maka onyinye Promising Young Artist na Africa Movie Academy Awards
